subject: Web3
title: The Sandbox
description: A quick, practical guide to The Sandbox.

hook.text: The Sandbox is a blockchain gaming world where players build, own, and monetize voxel-based experiences.

buildup.text: Major brands including Adidas, Gucci, and Snoop Dogg purchased virtual land to build branded experiences.

discovery.text: SAND tokens power the economy. Players earn them by creating games and experiences that others enjoy.

twist.text: Most of The Sandbox remains undeveloped. Landowners speculated on value without building anything on their plots.

climax.text: The Sandbox is a bet that user-generated content plus true ownership will create a vibrant virtual economy.

punchline.text: Big brands bought virtual land. Most of it is still empty.

quiz.question: What powers The Sandbox economy?
options: SAND tokens that players earn and spend
